projects.name: Research Paper Multilabel Classification
details: Classified research papers into 18 subject areas using TF-IDF and OneVsRestClassifier with LinearSVC.
Achieved a weighted F1-score of 0.54 and implemented hyperparameter tuning with GridSearchCV.

projects.name: Enhancing Food Distribution Efficiency with Ant Colony Optimization
details: Optimized delivery routes for ingredient distribution using Kaggle's food delivery data and Ant Colony Optimization.
Automated data processing with Python frameworks (NumPy, Pandas, NetworkX) and visualized results with matplotlib.

projects.name: Swine fat measurement by using computer vision (Senior Project)
details: Developed a Computer Vision-based system to measure fat thickness in pig carcasses, reducing manual effort and errors.
Trained YOLOv8 for object detection and implemented real-time predictions integrated with FastAPI.
Streamlined model performance by carefully cleaning and sourcing data directly from swine production lines.
Transformed business requirements into functional implementations using Visual Basic .NET and SQL.
Modified database structures to align with evolving business needs, ensuring efficient data migration and relational integrity.
Developed stored procedures for data retrieval and manipulation, enhancing system performance and usability.
Migrated legacy data into modern systems while maintaining data integrity.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless system integration.
Analyzed team workflows to measure task allocation efficiency using Excel and presented actionable recommendations to reduce overtime.
Identified process inefficiencies and proposed solutions, including resource optimization and task reassignment.
Enhanced task management efficiency by collaborating across departments to understand team roles and responsibilities.
Capstone Project: Automated measurement of swine fat thickness using Computer Vision and YOLOv8, reducing manual effort and improving accuracy.

interests.title: Areas
details: Financial payment systems, driven by a passion for creating impactful solutions in the banking industry.

certificates.title: Google Cloud Skill Boost
certificates.description: Earned multiple badges through Google Cloud Skill Boost, demonstrating proficiency in infrastructure building with Terraform and language processing with ML. Highlights include expertise in AI and machine learning, generative AI with Vertex AI, and baseline infrastructure (GCP) setup.

certificates.title: Google Data Analytics
certificates.description: Completed the Google Data Analytics Professional Certificate, demonstrating proficiency in data preparation, processing, analysis, and visualization using spreadsheets, SQL, Tableau, and R.
